price: Kuma daga mutãne akwai mai yin musu* ga Allah bã da wani ilmi ba kuma bã da wata shiriya ba, kuma bã da wani littãfi mai haskakãwa ba.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِي ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَلَا هُدٗى وَلَا كِتَٰبٖ مُّنِيرٖ
footnotes: * Kashi na biyu shi ne mũgun malami ko Shaiɗan mai ƙõƙarin ɓatar da mabiyansa wãwãye.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
